name: screenbeard
message:
I think it must be my fault. Other people have done it too. I don't know how to get around it though until Salmon is more prevalent and Facebook supports it. The other option is to do what I did for a little while there and put a  link halfway through the post on facebook and make people come here to read it... Or Facebook could stop being  such a prick and actually highlight that the content was imported.

As to the Nexus One, I was keen but I hear the HTC Desire is a better phone - it's the same phone with a few improvements.
